contentrichtext.text: <!-- This article was auto-generated by [[User:Polbot]]. --> {{taxobox |status = DD |status_system = IUCN2.3 |regnum = [[Plant]]ae |unranked_divisio = [[Angiosperms]] |unranked_classis = [[Eudicots]] |unranked_ordo = [[Rosids]] |ordo = [[Fabales]] |familia = [[Fabaceae]] |genus = ''[[Xylia]]'' |species = '''''X. mendoncae''''' |binomial = ''Xylia mendoncae'' |binomial_authority = Torre |}} '''''Xylia mendoncae''''' is a species of [[legume]] in the [[Fabaceae]] family. It is found only in [[Mozambique]]. ==References== * Bandeira, S. 1998. [http://www.iucnredlist.org/search/details.php/34523/all Xylia mendoncae]. [http://www.iucnredlist.org 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. ] Downloaded on 19 July 2007.
